27 #define REACTPHYSICS3D_POLYGON_VERTEX_ARRAY_H

29 // Libraries
30 #include <reactphysics3d/configuration.h>
31 #include <cassert>
32 
33 namespace reactphysics3d {
34 
35 // Class PolygonVertexArray
45 class PolygonVertexArray {
46 
47  public:
48 
50  enum class VertexDataType {VERTEX_FLOAT_TYPE, VERTEX_DOUBLE_TYPE};
51 
53  enum class IndexDataType {INDEX_INTEGER_TYPE, INDEX_SHORT_TYPE};
54 
56  struct PolygonFace {
57 
59  uint32 nbVertices;
60 
63  uint32 indexBase;
64  };
65 
66  protected:
67 
69  uint32 mNbVertices;
70 
72  const unsigned char* mVerticesStart;
73 
76  uint32 mVerticesStride;
77 
79  const unsigned char* mIndicesStart;
80 
83  uint32 mIndicesStride;
84 
86  uint32 mNbFaces;
87 
89  PolygonFace* mPolygonFacesStart;
90 
92  VertexDataType mVertexDataType;
93 
95  IndexDataType mIndexDataType;
96 
97  public:
98 
100  PolygonVertexArray(uint32 nbVertices, const void* verticesStart, uint32 verticesStride,
101  const void* indexesStart, uint32 indexesStride,
102  uint32 nbFaces, PolygonFace* facesStart,
103  VertexDataType vertexDataType, IndexDataType indexDataType);
104 
106  ~PolygonVertexArray() = default;
107 
109  VertexDataType getVertexDataType() const;
110 
112  IndexDataType getIndexDataType() const;
113 
115  uint32 getNbVertices() const;
116 
118  uint32 getNbFaces() const;
119 
121  uint32 getVerticesStride() const;
122 
124  uint32 getIndicesStride() const;
125 
127  uint32 getVertexIndexInFace(uint32 faceIndex32, uint32 noVertexInFace) const;
128 
130  PolygonFace* getPolygonFace(uint32 faceIndex) const;
131 
133  const unsigned char* getVerticesStart() const;
134 
136  const unsigned char* getIndicesStart() const;
137 };
138 
139 // Return the vertex data type
143 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE PolygonVertexArray::VertexDataType PolygonVertexArray::getVertexDataType() const {
144  return mVertexDataType;
145 }
146 
147 // Return the index data type
151 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE PolygonVertexArray::IndexDataType PolygonVertexArray::getIndexDataType() const {
152  return mIndexDataType;
153 }
154 
155 // Return the number of vertices
159 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE uint32 PolygonVertexArray::getNbVertices() const {
160  return mNbVertices;
161 }
162 
163 // Return the number of faces
167 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE uint32 PolygonVertexArray::getNbFaces() const {
168  return mNbFaces;
169 }
170 
171 // Return the vertices stride (number of bytes)
175 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE uint32 PolygonVertexArray::getVerticesStride() const {
176  return mVerticesStride;
177 }
178 
179 // Return the indices stride (number of bytes)
183 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE uint32 PolygonVertexArray::getIndicesStride() const {
184  return mIndicesStride;
185 }
186 
187 // Return a polygon face of the polyhedron
192 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE PolygonVertexArray::PolygonFace* PolygonVertexArray::getPolygonFace(uint32 faceIndex) const {
193  assert(faceIndex < mNbFaces);
194  return &mPolygonFacesStart[faceIndex];
195 }
196 
197 // Return the pointer to the start of the vertices array
201 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE const unsigned char* PolygonVertexArray::getVerticesStart() const {
202  return mVerticesStart;
203 }
204 
205 // Return the pointer to the start of the indices array
209 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE const unsigned char* PolygonVertexArray::getIndicesStart() const {
210  return mIndicesStart;
211 }
212 
213 }
214
